name: checkOrderStatus
description: Check the status and tracking information for a customer's order. Use this when a customer asks about their order, delivery status, or tracking.

orderId.description: The order ID or order number provided by the customer

customerPhone.description: The customer's phone number if they don't have the order ID

name: lookupCustomer
description: Look up customer account information to verify identity or retrieve account details. Use this to find customer information when they call.

name: createAppointment
description: Create a new appointment or schedule a callback for the customer. Use this when a customer wants to book an appointment or schedule a time to be contacted.

date.description: The date for the appointment in YYYY-MM-DD format

time.description: The time for the appointment in HH:MM format (24-hour)

duration.description: Duration of the appointment in minutes (default: 30)

phone.description: The customer's phone number for contact

purpose.description: Brief description of the appointment purpose

name: updateAppointment
description: Update or modify an existing appointment (reschedule or cancel). Use this when a customer wants to change their appointment details.

appointmentId.description: The unique appointment ID to update

newDate.description: New date for the appointment in YYYY-MM-DD format

newTime.description: New time for the appointment in HH:MM format

name: searchDatabase
description: Search the database for general information about products, services, or policies. Use this for general inquiries that require looking up information.

filters.description: Optional filters to narrow down the search
